name: cyberpop!
description:
A quick tutorial on how to play Cyberpop! 

Move - WASD

Basic Attack - Left mouse click

Ability attack - Right mouse click  Special move - Shift button

Depending on the character you have chosen to play, the abilities will be different. 

Oni Ronin Abilities: 

The Ronin moves quickly and attacks in quick sweeps. They use a katana for their basic attacks, and their ability lets them send out a big sweep to stun their enemies. Ronin's special move lets them dash past their enemies, obstacles will stop them. 

Untamed Abilities:

The Untamed will let nothing past their armor and heavy attacks. The Untamed wears massive gauntlets for their basic attacks, and uses the gauntlets to activate their shield ability. The shield soaks up any ranged attack, and charges up their special move, to return the bullets.
